pull.title: build: Fix / improve coverage scripts
pull.body:
The first commit ensures early error catching.

The second commit adds the `-g` flag that was missed during the migration from Autotools.

This PR is intended to be tested with GCC compiler (as clang support is still under [scrutiny](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/issues/341)). Depending on the `lcov` version, additional flags `-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS="-fprofile-update=atomic" -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS="-fprofile-update=atomic"` may be required.

events.body:

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with 👎 to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

ACK 6e5254cf687578ebb686628cf89f2509d415f04f

Light CR and test.

```
cmake -B build -DENABLE_WALLET=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Coverage
cmake --build build -j18
cmake -P build/Coverage.cmake
```

Induced failure (and received error as expected) with:
```diff
 execute_process(
+  COMMAND rm test_bitcoin.info
   COMMAND ${LCOV_FILTER_COMMAND} test_bitcoin.info test_bitcoin_filtered.info
   WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}
   COMMAND_ERROR_IS_FATAL ANY
```
